root.name: Secret Files 3
root.description: OverviewIn this third game in the Secret Files series, the game begins when Max is arrested at his wedding with Nina and is accused of terrorism. Nina begins her presumably biggest adventure to solve quests in order to free Max and to save mankind from disaster.The game is a traditional point-and-click adventure but with great cinematic production value. The backgrounds are pre-rendered, but the characters are fully 3D animated.The story was written down by a professional writing team from NEOS Film.PC System RequirementsOS:Windows® XP/Vista™/Windows 7™/Windows 8™Processor:Pentium® IV 2 Ghz Single Core or 100 % compatible ProcessorMemory:512 MB RAMGraphics:DirectX® 9-compatible Graphicard with min. 128 MB memoryHard Drive:2 GB HD spaceSound:DirectX® 9-compatible 16 Bit-Soundcard (optional)
